text: The result of the vote was not in doubt. For the Tories were massed in answer to their whips to defeat a censure motion on the Government for 'undermining the Health Service' and placing heavy burdens on those least able to bear them. Mr. Brown declared that the policy under censure was monstrous. It had offended many people, far beyond the ranks of Labour supporters.
handwritten_text: The result of the vote was not in doubt. For the Tories were massed in answer to their whips to defeat a censure motion on the Government for 'undermining the Health Service' and placing heavy burdens on those least able to bear them. Mr. Brown declared that the policy under censure was monstrous. It had offended many people, far beyond the ranks of Labour supporters.
